---
category: news
title: "Startup mapping out Austin's homeless camps"
excerpt: "Nomadik AI is beta testing mapping technology that pinpoints where homeless camps are set up. A map is posted on the company's homepage. “What we want to do is provide that data layer so that the nonprofits and the city can actually effectively manage their resources to tailor their solutions,” said Trevor Sorrells, co-founder of Nomadik AI."
